creator: Curiositydrive
title: Running Mobile Phone With 18650 Battery
description: This project demonstrates how to run a mobile phone using a 3.7v rechargeable 18650 battery as a backup power source in emergency situations.
steps: Apply glue generously around the mobile phone's battery pins using a glue gun to create an impression of the pins.
Strip the ends of the wires and place them on the grooves formed by the pin impressions in the glue.
Strip the other ends of the wires and attach them to the terminals of the 18650 battery.
Ensure correct polarity and connect the positive and negative wires from the battery to the corresponding positive and negative battery input terminals of the mobile phone.
